crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'conferences_server' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'name': doc.name}); }

listing_by_number.map: function (doc) {if (doc.pvt_type != 'conferences_server' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; if(doc.numbers) {for(number in doc.numbers) {emit(number, null);}}}
